All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Characters
Enum for the characters in the game.
CurrentTurnPanel
A panel to display the current player's turn in the game.
DiceRollManager
This class is responsible for managing the dice rolls.
DiceSignature
Enum class for the different dice signatures that exist in the game.
GameBoard
This class represents a game board, or more accurately a bitBoard.
GameManager
This class manages the game logic and flow for the Komputer Kivi game.
GamePalette
A class to hold the color palette for the game.
Historian
Historian.java This class is responsible for maintaining the history of turns in the game.
Human
Represents a human player in the game.
KiviBoardPanel
KiviBoardPanel.java This class is responsible for creating the game board for Kivi.
KiviButtonStyle
A custom button class to give the buttons a rounded appearance and hover effect.
KiviSetupConfirmation
A class to confirm the setup of the game with the selected characters.
KomputerKiviMain
Strictly a driver class to launch the game.
MainGameFrame
The main frame for the game.
PlayerKits
Represents the player kits in the game.
PlayerPanel
A panel to display the players in the game.
PlayerSelectionWindow
A window for selecting the players' characters.
Robot
Represents a robot player in the game.
SettingsDialog
 
SettingsManager
 
SettingsMenu
 
SignatureIdentifier
A utility class to analyze a dice roll and determine the possible moves that can be made.
Turn
Represents a turn in the game.
